segments.text: Mary , set your alarm clock for seven tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to take you to your school to register for classes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . I haven't done that yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can choose classes that you like at the school office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are core courses and electives .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Core courses are ones that you must take . Elective courses are ones that you get to choose for yourself .
segments.speaker: S1
